title: Alibaba’s Quarterly Profit Declines, But Revenue Rises
sub_head: Revenue grew 10% from a year earlier, boosted by 20% growth in its cloud segment
body:
Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. said its quarterly revenue grew about 10%, though profit fell as the Chinese e-commerce giant faced sluggish consumption in the world’s second-biggest economy and rising spending to counter competition from homegrown rivals.
The company posted quarterly revenue of $38.07 billion, below the $38.98 billion that analysts surveyed by FactSet were expecting.
